Name: Abracadabra
Description: Your opponent loses X cards from his hand

Name: Care
Description: Give to a creature X health points

Name: Complete Care
Description: Restore the health point of a creature

Name: Discard
Description: Force the opponent to discard a card of his choice

Name: Exchange
Description: Each player chose an opponent's card and trade them ( from their hand )

Name: Hypnosis
Description: Take control of an enemy creature for X turn

Name: Metamorphosis
Description: Transforms a creature in another random creature

Name: Mirror
Description: Send back the next opponent's attack ( trap )

Name: Paralyse
Description: Forbid the opponent to use a card for X turns

Name: Picking
Description: Picking X more cards from the deck

Name: Resurrection
Description: Allow the player using this effect to get a discarded card

Name: Reverse
Description: Reverse the board for the rest of the game

Name: Stealing
Description: Take a random card from the opponent's deck

Name: Sticky
Description: Your opponent's spell cost X more next Turn

Name: Trap
Description: Deal 3 damage or summon two 1/1 snacks
